name: HospitalBasedDialysisServices
title: Hospital Based Dialysis Services
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to identify concepts that represent hospital based dialysis procedures indicative of acute dialysis),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent hospital based dialysis procedures),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent outpatient or home based dialysis procedures)

concept.display: Performance of Urinary Filtration, Intermittent, Less than 6 Hours Per Day
Performance of Urinary Filtration, Prolonged Intermittent, 6-18 hours Per Day
Performance of Urinary Filtration, Continuous, Greater than 18 hours Per Day
